item.title: Simple Commit-Msg for Git Hook
item.author: elricfeng@gmail.com (Wenfeng Gao)
item.description: Although I am the only contributor of my own Github project, I still want my commit message to be tidier. I wish all the commit messages will follow the pattern like: [Example]: This is an Example. [Exercise]: This ia an Exercise. [Problem]: A problem solved. [Other]: Maybe a merge commit. However, I usually remember to follow this pattern after the commit, that’s really disappointed. So I decided to write a simple hook to prevent this kind of Amnesia.
